Settings.Name: OrchestratorQueueName
Settings.Description: Orchestrator queue Name. The value must match with the queue name defined on Orchestrator.

Settings.Name: OrchestratorAssetsFolder
Settings.Description: Process folder used for storing assets

Settings.Name: OrchestratorQueueFolder
Settings.Description: Folder name. The value must match a folder defined in Orchestrator and queue specified as OrchestratorQueueName should be created in this folder. For classic folders leave the value field empty.

Settings.Name: logF_BusinessProcessName
Settings.Description: Logging field which allows grouping of log data of two or more subprocesses under the same business process name

Settings.Name: BREIncorrectInput
Settings.Value: Input data not in the correct format.

Constants.Name: MaxRetryNumber
Constants.Description: Must be 0 if working with Orchestrator queues. If > 0, the robot will retry the same transaction which failed with a system exception. Must be an integer value.

Constants.Name: MaxConsecutiveSystemExceptions
Constants.Description: The number of consecutive system exceptions allowed. If MaxConsecutiveSystemExceptions is reached, the job is stopped. To disable this feature, set the value to 0.

Constants.Name: ExScreenshotsFolderPath
Constants.Description: Where to save exceptions screenshots - can be a full or a relative path.

Constants.Name: LogMessage_GetTransactionData
Constants.Description: Static part of logging message. Calling Get Transaction Data.

Constants.Name: LogMessage_GetTransactionDataError
Constants.Value: Error getting transaction data for Transaction Number:
Constants.Description: Static part of logging message. Error retrieving Transaction Data.

Constants.Name: LogMessage_Success
Constants.Description: Static part of logging message. Processed Transaction succesful.

Constants.Name: LogMessage_BusinessRuleException
Constants.Description: Static part of logging message. Processed Transaction failed with business exception.

Constants.Name: LogMessage_ApplicationException
Constants.Description: Static part of logging message. Processed Transaction failed with application exception.

Constants.Name: ExceptionMessage_ConsecutiveErrors
Constants.Value: The maximum number of consecutive system exceptions was reached.
Constants.Description: Error message in case MaxConsecutiveSystemExceptions number is reached.

Constants.Name: RetryNumberGetTransactionItem
Constants.Description: The number of times Get Transaction Item activity is retried in case of an exception. Must be an integer >= 1.

Constants.Name: RetryNumberSetTransactionStatus
Constants.Description: The number of times Set transaction status activity is retried in case of an exception. Must be an integer >= 1.

Constants.Name: ShouldMarkJobAsFaulted
Constants.Description: Must be TRUE or FALSE. If the value is TRUE and an error occurs in Initialization state or the MaxConsecutiveSystemExceptions is reached, the job is marked as Faulted.
